desc: To get started with AE2, you will need to mine an important resource for the mod known as &bCertus Quartz&f. You will find Certus Quartz Crystals in Meteroites that you can mine for Certus Quartz &eDust&f and &eCrystals&f.

quests.title: Welcome to &aArs Nouveau&f!
desc:
Welcome to &aArs Nouveau&f! 

Ars Nouveau is a magic mod that allows you to create custom spells with the different Glyphs made within the mod!

quests.title: Quest 63DD7F5A
desc:
Tier 2 Glyphs require 5 levels of experience to be made. 

They also require a &9Mage's Spell Book&r to create.

quests.title: Quest 441C0659
desc: Tier 1 Glyphs require 3 levels of experience to be made.

quests.title: Quest 6F3602F5
desc:
Tier 3 Glyphs require 10 levels of experience to be made. 

They also require an &6Archmage Spell Book&r.

quests.title: Magebloom Fiber
desc:
Using our Enchanting Apparatus structure, we'll want to craft our first seed, the &5Magebloom Seed&r. 

This will be used to create us some magical clothing!

quests.title: Enchanting Apparatus
desc:
The &9Enchanting Apparatus&r is used to craft various items within the mod. It requires Source to work.

It is also a multiblock structure that utilizes Arcane Pedestals to craft.

Start by placing an Arcane Core in the ground, then place the Enchanting Apparatus on top of it. Surround the Apparatus with Arcane Pedestals.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/ars/enchanting_app.png width:200 height:175 align:1}

quests.title: Arcane Pedestals
quests.subtitle: Fancy Tables
desc:
Arcane Pedestals are needed for the Ritual Brazier and crafting items with an Enchanting Apparatus. 

Go ahead and make yourself 8 of them!

quests.title: Scribes Table
quests.subtitle: Upgrading Spells
desc:
If you want to cast better spells, you'll need a &6Scribe's Table&r to unlock new glyphs for your spellbook. 

There are 3 tiers of glyphs to unlock, and each one requires some experience and items. 

The Scribe's Table is also used to attach spells to Spell Parchments. To do this, place a Spell Parchment on the table, select the spell in your Spellbook, then sneak right-click the book on the table. 

To create a Glyph, right-click on the Scribe's Table with your spellbook. Search for the glyph you want to make, then click Select at the bottom. Right-click the table with the items required, and the glyph will be created. Use the glyph to learn it. 

Note: The table can pull items from nearby inventories.

quests.title: Spell Books
quests.subtitle: Our First Spellbook
desc:
To get started, you'll need to craft yourself a &6Novice Spellbook&r! 

This is where you create and store your spells. 

Hitting the &9C&r key will open up the 'Create a Spell' page. On the left, there are several tabs, but the main 3 are: Spell Creation, Color Picker, and Familiars. 

This spellbook will only allow you to create and use Tier 1 Glyphs. To create better spells, you'll need to upgrade your Spellbook!

quests.title: Apprentice Spell Book
desc:
This is the next upgrade to your Spellbook! 

This will increase your overall mana and mana regen, as well as allowing you to create and use Tier 2 Glyphs.

quests.title: Archmage Spell Book
desc:
To create the final tier of your Spellbook, you'll need to have killed the &6Wilden Chimera&r. 

This is a Ritual that you'll need to complete using a &9Ritual Brazier&r.

quests.title: Ritual Brazier
desc:
The &9Ritual Brazier&r is used to cast rituals. It can also be used for decoration. If you want to light the Brazier, use a Light spell on it. 

To perform rituals, you'll need Arcane Pedestals as well. As there are so many rituals to cast, make sure to check out each of them using the &6Worn Notebook&r! 

This can be done by holding Ctrl on the Ritual Table while the book is in your inventory.

quests.title: Potion Jar
quests.subtitle: Storing Potions
desc:
The &9Potion Jar&r stores up to 100 potions. You can remove them by using an empty bottle or a potion flask on the jar. 

Wixies will use these jars during Potion Autocrafting.

quests.title: Imbuement Chamber
quests.subtitle: Creating Source Gems
desc:
To create one of the main crafting items in Ars, the &9Source Gem&r, we'll need to make an &6Imbuement Chamber&r. 

The Imbuement Chamber requires Source to imbue items. It produces a small amount of Source by itself, but can also use Source Jars as a power source. 

Several recipes also require Arcane Pedestals to be placed around it as well.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/ars/imbuement.png width:200 height:150 align:1}

quests.title: Smart Filter
desc:
To gain further knowledge of spells, we'll need a specific type of magical wood! 

Archwood trees can be found in the overworld.

quests.title: Source Jar
quests.subtitle: Storing Source
desc:
In Ars Nouveau, the power system for machines is called &9Source&r. 

To start collecting some Source, we'll need a Source Jar. 

Source can also be moved with buckets, or by breaking and picking up Source Jars.

quests.title: Magebloom Seed
quests.subtitle: Growing Magic
desc:
Using our Enchanting Apparatus structure, we'll want to craft our first seed, the &5Magebloom Seed&r. 

This will be used to create us some magical clothing!

quests.title: Volcanic Sourcelink
desc:
The Volcanic Sourcelink generates Source by consuming burnable items. Archwood logs will generate bonus Source. 

As it burns items, it will convert nearby stone into lava. 

This also generates Lava Lilys.

quests.title: Runic Chalk
quests.subtitle: Placeable Spells
desc:
Runic Chalk is used to draw permanent Runes on that ground. These runes will cast spells on entities that walk over them. 

To attach a spell to a rune, inscribe a &eSpell Parchment&r using a Scribe's Table.

Note: The Rune will need Source to operate.

quests.title: Quest 5CFBA24B
desc:
While holding your Spellbook, you can press C to open up the spell creation page. 

Each spell must have a form. You start off with 3 basic forms: Projectile, Self-cast, and Touch. 

For the Effect, this determines what happens when you cast the spell. You can have up to 9 effects per spell. 

For starters, you have Harm and Break. 

Select one Form and one Effect, name your spell, and click create!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/ars/spellbook.png width:200 height:150 align:1}

quests.title: Mana
quests.subtitle: Mage Power
desc:
In the bottom left of your screen, you'll see a bar. This bar is your mana pool! 

There are several ways to increase your mana pool, or increase the efficiency of your spells as you progress through the mod. Upgrading your spellbook can also increase your mana!

quests.title: &5Source Gems
desc: To create Source Gems, we'll need to put either Lapis or Amethyst Shards into the Imbuement Chamber. Over time, these will convert to Source Gems!

quests.title: Dowsing Rod
quests.subtitle: Magic Finder
desc:
The &6Dowsing Rod&r gives you Magic Find and Scrying when used. 

This allows you to see nearby magic creatures as well as helping you find amethyst!

quests.title: Vitalic Sourcelink
quests.subtitle: Generates Source from Mob Deaths and Animal Breeding

quests.title: Alchemical Sourcelink
quests.subtitle: Power through Potions
desc:
The &9Alchemical Sourcelink&r produces Source from adjacent potion jars. 

The amount of source varies per potion and complexity.

quests.title: Mycelial Sourcelink
quests.subtitle: Generates Source from Nearby Food
desc:
Source Berries produce more Source than other sources. 

This will also convert grass or dirt into Mycelium in a 3x3 area around it. It will also grow mushrooms around it if the space is empty.

quests.title: Agronomic Sourcelink
quests.subtitle: Creates Source using the growth of Plants
desc:
Placing this near growing plants or saplings will provide Source. Archwood trees provide more Source! 

Note: Bonemealing does not produce Source.

quests.title: Sourcestone
quests.subtitle: Formerly "Arcane Stones"
desc: With Source Gems, you can get started crafting the various machines by creating &5Sourcestones&r.

quests.title: Spell Parchment
desc: Used to inscribe spells on with the Scribe's Table.

quests.title: Summoning Help!
desc: The Dominion Wand is used for controlling the creatures you might encounter in the world! Each being responds differently to the wand, so make sure to read up in the Worn Notebook!

quests.title: Enchanters Sword
desc:
The &9Enchanter's Sword&r allows you to attach a Touch Spell to the sword. 

All spells on the Sword gain 1 additional Amplify augment to the last effect on the spell. 

To apply a spell to the sword, use a Scribe's Table. Create the spell without using a form.

quests.title: Enchanters Shield
desc:
When blocking damage, the &9Enchanter's Shield&r will give the user Mana Regen and Spell Damage for a short amount of time. 

Additionally, the shield will repair itself over time using the wearer's mana.

quests.title: Enchanters Mirror
desc:
The &9Enchanter's Mirror&r will apply a self spell when used. 

Spells cast with this mirror are discounted and gain additional bonus duration. 

To apply a spell, use a Scribe's table. Create a spell without using a form.

quests.title: Spell Bow
desc:
This bow can be inscribed with a spell using a Scribe's Table. 

At the cost of mana, arrows will become Spell Arrows and will apply the spell on their target. 

If you have no arrows, a spell arrow that deals 0 damage will be cast. If there is not enough mana, regular arrows will be fired instead. 

The &9Enchanter's Bow&r can also use special Augment Arrows that empower the inscribed spell.

quests.title: The Jars
desc:
The &9Jar of Light&r summons a floating light source that follows you. 

The &6Jar of Voiding&r destroys items you pick up in exchange for mana. This can be filtered. 

To add or remove an item to be destroyed by the jar, use the jar with the item in your off hand, or use an item on the Scribe's Table with the jar placed on it. 

The jar must be on your hotbar to function.

quests.title: Rings of Discount
desc: The Rings of Discount provides a small bonus to max mana and mana regen. It also reduces the total cost to cast a spell.

quests.title: Belt Of Unstable Gifts
desc: This belt will give random positive potion effects for a short duration. These will vary in strength.

quests.title: Belt Of Levitation
desc:
Have you ever wanted to just hover everywhere you go? 

This belt allows you to levitate. To activate, just sneak while in the air, either while falling or from jumping.

quests.title: The Amulets
desc:
The &9Amulet of Mana Boost&r gives a boost to max mana. 

The &6Amulet of Mana Regen&r gives a boost to your mana regen.

quests.title: Wand
desc:
The &9Caster's Wand&r only accepts a single spell, and is inscribed using the Scribe's Table. 

Wand spells always start with Projectile > Accelerate, and MUST be inscribed with a spell that does not have another method (like touch, self, etc). 

This allows you to cast spells beyond the 10 spell cap. If you want to use Break, just inscribe the wand with Break by itself.

quests.title: Quest 36CDA39C
desc:
This Quest has been authored by &6AllTheMods Staff&r, or a &2Community contributor&r for use in AllTheMods Modpacks. 

As all &6AllTheMods&r packs are licensed under &eAll Rights Reserved&r, this Quest is not allowed to be used in any public packs not released by &6AllTheMods Team&r without explicit permission. 

This quest is intentionally hidden, if you're seeing this, you're in editing mode.

quests.title: &7Leather Armor
desc:
&7Leather Armor&r is the worst Armor set you can get. 

That is mostly because &c&lMojang&r expected you to get it before any other. 

I almost never get it though because I struggle to find that many &8C&fo&8w&fs&r, sorry &c&lMojang&r!

quests.title: &8Chainmail Armor
desc:
&8Chainmail Armor&r is a little worse than Iron. Its main use in &l&2Minecraft&r was its elusive nature, only being obtained through Trades and Mob Drops. 

Of course this is modded though, so we can craft it now! Which takes away its purpose...

quests.title: &eGolden Armor
desc:
&eGolden Armor&r is right between Iron and &7Leather&r. But its Durability is much closer to &7Leather&r. 

There is not much use for it besides having Piglins Neutral towards you when wearing some &eGold Armor&r.

quests.title: Iron Helmet
desc:
Now this is what I like! Iron is very common and its Armor is incredible for early game. 

Zombies and Skeletons stand just about no chance!

quests.title: &bDiamond Armor
desc:
&bDiamond Armor&r is the next on the &l&2Vanilla&r chain, this is also usually where we start Enchanting it as well! 

I recommend Protection and its various forms, we don't have to be picky with modded!

quests.title: &cNetherite Armor
desc:
&cNetherite Armor&r is the best &l&2Vanilla&r can get. It has same Armor Points as &bDiamond&r but more Armor Toughness. 

Probably because you need &bDiamond&r to make it!

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Armor
desc:
What you think &l&2Vanilla&r was all we got? 

&6Allthemodium Armor&r has more Armor Points and Armor Toughness, plus increased Protection against Magic and other buffs you can read about in &6&lAllthemodium&r Quest Page! 

BTW you will need &cNetherite&r to craft it.

quests.title: &3Vibranium Armor
desc:
Much higher stats in everything with the next in line for &6&lAllthemodium&r Armors, &3Vibranium&r! 

You will need &6Allthemodium Armor&r to create it.

quests.title: &5Unobtainium Armor
desc:
The greatest Armor we can get from &6&lAllthemodium&r, &5Unobtainium&r! 

Now with 100% Knockback Resistance and higher stats everywhere! 

Also needs &3Vibranium Armor&r to make it.

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Arcanist Gear
desc: &6Allthemodium Armor&r but with buffs to &d&lArs Nouveau&r Spells!

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Mage Outfit
desc: &6Allthemodium Armor&r but with buffs to &e&lIron's Spells&r Spells!

quests.title: &3Vibranium Arcanist Gear
desc: &3Vibranium Armor&r but with buffs to &d&lArs Nouveau&r Spells!

quests.title: &3Vibranium Mage Outfit
desc: &3Vibranium Armor&r but with buffs to &e&lIron's Spells&r Spells!

quests.title: &5Unobtainium Arcanist Gear
desc: &5Unobtainium Armor&r but with buffs to &d&lArs Nouveau&r Spells!

quests.title: &5Unobtainium Mage Outfit
desc: &5Unobtainium Armor&r but with buffs to &e&lIron's Spells&r Spells!

quests.title: &3Neptunium Armor
desc:
&3Neptunium&r is a reward from Neptune's Bounty which is gotten through Fishing! 
It also grants buffs to being Underwater.

quests.title: &cPyromancer Outfit
desc: &d&lArs Elemental&r &cFire Armor&r!

quests.title: &cPyromancer Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &cFire Armor&r!

quests.title: &fAethermancer Outfit
desc: &d&lArs Elemental&r Air Armor!

quests.title: &2Geomancer Outfit
desc: &d&lArs Elemental&r &2Earth Armor&r!

quests.title: &3Aquamancer Outfit
desc: &d&lArs Elemental&r &3Water Armor&r!

quests.title: &5Sorceror's Outfit
desc: &eGold&r version of &d&lArs&r Armors!

quests.title: &5Arcanist Outfit
desc: Iron Armor of &d&lArs&r Armor.

quests.title: &5Battlemages Outfit
desc: &bDiamond&r version of &d&lArs&r Armors!

quests.title: &3Warden Armor
desc:
Why upgrade &cNetherite&r to &6Allthemodium&r or even anything else when we can upgrade it to &3Warden Armor&r! 

You'll need a few Warden Drops in order to make it though!

quests.title: &5Aethersent Armor
desc:
&5Aethersent Ore&r is found during Meteorite Showers in &5&lEternal Starlight&r. Small ones break on impact, you'll need to wait for big Meteors! 

Or is it Meteorites? What's the difference?

quests.title: &cThermal Springstone Armor
desc: &cThermal Springstone&r spawns in hot ponds found rarely in &5&lEternal Starlight&r!

quests.title: &bGlacite Armor
desc: &bGlacite&r is found in the cold biomes of &5&lEternal Starlight&r!

quests.title: &9Swamp Silver Armor
desc: &9Swamp Silver&r is found within the muddy swamps of &5&lEternal Starlight&r.

quests.title: &6Copper Armor
desc: Finally &6Copper&r has a real use!

quests.title: &9Wandering Magician Gear
desc:
&7Leather Armor&r just with a little Arcane sprinkled over it. 

Gives boosts to Mana for Spells, just a little bit.

quests.title: &4Scarecrow Outfit
desc: Very simple and cheap &e&lIron's Spells&r Armor, helpful for early game!

quests.title: &4Netherite Battlemage Outfit
desc:
Wait so you're telling me it has the same stats as &cNetherite&r? Plus Spell Boosts? 

Why would anyone want regular &cNetherite&r!

quests.title: &5Electromancer Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &5Electric Armor&r!

quests.title: &aArchevoker Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &aEvocation Armor&r!

quests.title: &4Cultist Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &4Blood Armor&r!

quests.title: &bCryomancer Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &bIce Armor&r!

quests.title: &dShadow-Walker Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &dEnder Armor&r!

quests.title: &6Priest Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &6Holy Armor&r!

quests.title: &2Plagued Outfit
desc: &e&lIron's Spells&r &2Nature Armor&r!

quests.title: &bFerricore Amor
desc:
&bFerricore&r has same stats as Iron but has other abilities Iron wishes it had! 

Check out the Item descriptions to learn more of what they can do!

quests.title: &cBlazegold Armor
desc:
&cBlazegold&r has same stats as Iron but has other abilities Iron wishes it had! 

Check out the Item descriptions to learn more of what they can do!

quests.title: &6Bronze Armor
desc:
&6Bronze&r is a combination of &6Copper&r and Tin. 

There is a dozen different ways to make the alloy, I won't tell you the right way to do so.

quests.title: &9Lapis Lazuli Armor
desc:
Thanks to &5&lMekanism&r we can now make Armor out of &9Lapis Lazuli&r! 

It kinda blows though...

quests.title: &7Osmium Armor
desc: &7Osmium&r spawns around Deepslate and only needs Iron to Mine but it gives better stats than &cNetherite&r!

quests.title: &eRefined Glowstone Armor
desc: &7Osmium&r + &6Glowstone&r = &eRefined Glowstone&r!

quests.title: &5Refined Obsidian Armor
desc:
By infusing Obsidian with &bDiamonds&r we can get Refined Obsidian Dust! 

Then, we can compress &7Osmium&r into it to get it in Ingot form. 

After that, we can turn those Ingots into Armor with better stats than even &6Allthemodium Armor&r!

quests.title: &7Steel Armor
desc: &7Steel&r is used for most Machines in &5&lMekanism&r... plus Armor which is nice!

quests.title: &eQuantum &bArmor&r (&l&7MI&r)
quests.subtitle: Invincible
desc:
Quite literally invincible, nothing can hit you and do damage. 

Currently you need to upgrade &cNetherite Armor&r with a &eQuantum &bUpgrade&r but your friends in the &6&lATM Team&r are working at making that recipe harder! 

And you can't do anything to stop it! &lBWAHAHAHAHA

quests.title: &aInferium Armor
desc:
With &bDiamond Armor&r and a few &aInferium Items&r we can craft &aInferium Armor&r! 

They can also be upgraded with Tinkering!

quests.title: &2Prudentium Armor
desc: Upgraded version of &aInferium&r.

quests.title: &cTertium Armor
desc: Upgraded version of &2Prudentium&r.

quests.title: &9Imperium Armor
desc: Upgraded version of &cTertium&r.

quests.title: &4Supremium Armor
desc: Upgraded version of &9Imperium&r.

quests.title: &6Awakened Supremium Armor
desc:
You'll need to use an Awakening Ritual to get the Items to do another Awakening Ritual on &4Supremium Armor&r. 

I think it is worth it; it's the best Armor you can get from &2&lMystical&r!

quests.title: &7Compressed Iron Armor
desc: This armor set has same Armor Points as Iron but is better in both Toughness and Knockback Resistance.

quests.title: &8Pneumatic Armor
desc:
"I am Compressed Iron Man!" 

It can be used and upgraded with compressed Air!

quests.title: &2Sylvan Gear
desc: Basic Armor added by &a&lRoots Classic&r, you'll need a Ritual to get it though!

quests.title: &aWildwood Gear
desc: Late game Armor for &a&lRoots Classic&r

quests.title: Bee Armor 2
desc: This ones not any different, why are you checking it?

quests.title: Bee Armor 1
desc: Checkout the &6&lBumblezone&r Quest Page to learn more!

desc: &7Cloggrum&r is the Iron Ore of &2&lUndergarden&r. It spawns everywhere.

quests.title: &9Froststeel Armor
desc: &9Froststeel&r is a common Ore in the Cold Biomes of the &2&lUndergarden&r.

quests.title: &cUtherium Armor
desc: &cUtherium Crystals&r drop from &cRotbeasts&r in the &2&lUndergarden&r!

quests.title: &aMekaSuit
quests.subtitle: As much Energy you can supply
desc:
With a ton of super expensive &l&5Mekanism&r Items you can upgrade &5Unobtainium Armor&r to the &aMekaSuit&r! 

Now it can hold Energy and instead of taking hearts from damage, it will take Energy. 

You can use Upgrade Units to make it even better!

quests.title: &l&bBasic Armor&r
desc:
Armor is a very important part of &l&2Minecraft&r, it is what protects you from harm. 

Different pieces of Armor give different Armor Points. These are what determine the effectiveness for your Armor, the more the merrier!

Most armor can be changed for more decoration with Armor Trims, use a piece of Armor with an Armor Trim, and an Item for coloring to change the look!

quests.title: Quest 04B31A60
desc:
This Quest has been authored by &6AllTheMods Staff&r, or a &2Community contributor&r for use in AllTheMods Modpacks. 

As all &6AllTheMods&r packs are licensed under &eAll Rights Reserved&r, this Quest is not allowed to be used in any public packs not released by &6AllTheMods Team&r without explicit permission. 

This quest is intentionally hidden, if you're seeing this, you're in editing mode.

quests.title: &7Ironwood Armor
desc:
By combining some Liveroot, an Iron Ingot, and a &eGold Nugget&r you can craft &7Ironwood&r! 

Sounds like you'll need an Axe and a Pickaxe to get some. 

All of the &7Ironwood Armor&r come with a level of Protection for free!

quests.title: &2Steeleaf Armor
desc:
&2Steeleaf&r is, technically an Ingot, found within Chests in &9&lThe Twilight Forest&r. 
Each part of the Armor gives a different Enchantment!

quests.title: &aKnightmetal Armor
desc:
These are not a fun one to get. 

You'll need &aKnightmetal Ingots&r which are obtained from Smelting &aArmor Shard Clusters&r. 

You get &aArmor Shard Clusters&r from combining 9 &aArmor Shards&r. 

&aArmor Shards&r are dropped from the &l&9Twilight Forest&r Goblins and rarely from Helmet Crabs.

quests.title: &4Fiery Armor
desc:
If you've somehow slain the Hydra or Ur-Ghast, then you'll have access to &4Fiery Tears/Blood&r, either work! 

Now you can make &4Fiery Armor&r, by upgrading your Iron Armor with either of the &4Fiery Vials&r. 

Now your Armor is stronger than &cNetherite&r and anyone unfortunate to hit you will be set ablaze!

quests.title: &fArctic Gear
desc:
Arctic Gear is made with Arctic Fur. Arctic Fur is dropped from Winter Wolves and Yetis! 

No, you can't shear either of them. 

The Gear can be dyed like &7Leather Armor&r!

quests.title: &9Yeti Outfit
desc:
The &9Yeti Outfit&r needs Alpha Yeti Fur, which you guessed it! Only drops from Alpha Yetis. 

Atleast the Outfit will slow down your Enemies by chilling them!

quests.title: &5Quantum Armor&r (&l&bAE2&r)
quests.subtitle: As much Energy you can supply
desc:
You think &5&lMekanism&r and &l&7Modern Industrialization&r can have all the fun? 

This &5Quantum Armor&r has default stats similar to &cNetherite Armor&r but, like the &aMekaSuit&r it can use Energy as a shield. 
It also has upgrades which can be installed to make you even more powerful! Like Flight, Night Vision, and even the ability to recharge. 

But the best part is that it can Linked to your Storage System! Then, you can automatically take Energy out from it and take out any Item from it no where you are.

quests.title: &8Ironwood
desc: {image:atm:textures/questpics/basicarmor/armor_ironwood.png width:100 height:150 align:center}

quests.title: Bounty Board
quests.subtitle: Killing All The Things
desc: Here you'll find all of the rewards you can get by slaying enemies.

quests.title: Kill The Ender Dragon
desc:
The Ender Dragon is the Boss that guards The End. 

When you enter an End Portal you'll arrive at the End Island where she spawns. 

She has 200 Hearts and can attack with Fireballs or ramming into you. 

You'll have to break the End Crystals on the pillars as they heal her, in order to kill her! 

Once you do kill her, she'll drop: Arcane Essence, Epic Shaderbags, Dragonskin, Dragon Scales from two different mods, and a bunch of experience! 

Then the Portal will open up so you can return to the Overworld, or you can find an End Gateway to explore the outer islands. You'll also find a Dragon Egg on the Portal.

quests.title: Kill The Wither
desc:
The Wither is the second Minecraft Boss, this one being more elective. 

You'll have to build the Wither to spawn him in. Using 4 Soul Sand in a T shape and placing 3 Wither Skeleton Skulls on top will spawn him in! 

He has 300 Hearts and will fly around shooting Wither Skulls at Players or Mobs. 

When taken to half Health he will gain a shield against Projectiles and will need to be killed with a Sword or Axe. 

Once you kill him he'll drop: Nether Star, chance at a Withering Soul, and a ton of Corail Items.

quests.title: Kill A Elder Guardian
desc:
The Elder Guardian was considered a third Boss for Minecraft before the Warden, but I consider him a Miniboss. 

The Elder Guardians spawn in Ocean Monuments. Three of them spawn there and will inflict Mining Fatigue on anyone nearby. 

If you want the treasures of the OCean Monument, you'll need to find and kill them! (Tip: I've always found 1 in the top Room, 1 on the far left, and 1 on the far right!) 

They have 80 Hearts and attack like normal Guardians, Lasers and Thorns! 

On death they will drop: Sponges, Prismarine, and their lunch...

quests.title: Kill The Wilden Chimera
desc:
The Wilden Chimera is a Boss added by Ars Nouveau and is needed for progressing through it. 

He needs to be summoned through a ritual then fought!

quests.title: Kill The Trader Villager and His Annoying Llamas
quests.title_plain: Kill The Trader Villager and His Annoying Llamas
quests.subtitle: "This is Personal" - AlfredGG
desc:
While making a lot of the questlines for ATM7, the Trader Villager thought it'd be funny to constantly push me around in the quest screen.

"Take them out. All of them."

- AlfredGG 

"I second this!" 

- Toshiba

quests.title: Kill The Warden
desc:
The Warden is a boss added in 1.20. 

He spawns by having 3 naturally spawning Sculk Shriekers going off in a row, or any Shriekers going off after a first Warden has spawned. 

He is the most powerful Mob added by Minecraft, with 500 Hearts and over 20 Hearts damage with his attacks. 

His attacks include hitting you and Sonar Blasts for those farther. 

His only weakness is being blind, but like daredevil it just made his other senses much stronger! If you are close he can smell you and careful with making noise! 

If you somehow kill him he will drop: Sculk Catalysts, Warden Carapace, and Heart of the Deep.

quests.title: Quest 08B60D8A
desc:
This Quest has been authored by &6AllTheMods Staff&r, or a &2Community contributor&r for use in AllTheMods Modpacks. 

As all &6AllTheMods&r packs are licensed under &eAll Rights Reserved&r, this Quest is not allowed to be used in any public packs not released by &6AllTheMods Team&r without explicit permission. 

This quest is intentionally hidden, if you're seeing this, you're in editing mode.

quests.title: Zombie Variants
desc:
Zombies have different varients that spawn in other Biomes. 

Husks- spawn in Deserts. 
Drowned- spawn Underwater. 
Gelid- spawn in Cold Biomes. 
Thickets- spawn in Jungles.

quests.title: Skeleton Variants
desc:
Skeletons have different varients, like Zombies do! 

Strays- spawn in Cold Biomes. 
Bogged- spawn in Swamps and Trial Chambers. 
Murks- spawn underwater in Coral Reefs. 
Verdants- spawn in Jungles.

quests.title: Overhauled Creepers
desc:
Overhauled Creepers gives us many different varients of Creepers for different Biomes. 

Each have different drops and even some are friendly! 

All are afraid of cats though...

quests.title: Overhauled Endermen
desc:
Overhauled Endermen is a similar Mod to Overhauled Creepers! Just with Endermen of course! 

You'll find all these Endermen in all different Biomes and each are unique in their own ways! Some have different attacks, some drop different Pearls, and they all look different!

quests.title: Kill The Lunar Monstrosity
desc:
The Lunar Monstrosity is the first Boss added in Eternal Starlight. 

This one lives in the middle of the Cursed Garden, good luck finding and fighting him!

quests.title: Kill The Starlight Golem
desc:
The Starlight Golem is the second Boss in the Eternal Starlight. 

He is charging in the Golem Forge awaiting for a Player to come fight him!

quests.title: Kill The Forgotten Guardian
desc:
The Forgotten Guardian is the Boss of the Undergarden. 

He rests in the Catacomb Structure.

quests.title: Kill A Ravager
desc:
The Ravager is a Miniboss that only spawns in harder Raids. 

If you don't know what Raids are or don't understand the updated way, that's perfectly fine, that's what Quests are for! 

By killing Pillager Captains (ones that are holding Banners) you can get Ominous Potions, when you drink them you'll get Bad Omen Effect. Then, you can walk near a Village and start a Raid. 

Raids will spawn Pillagers, Vindicators, Evokers, Witches, and Ravagers to fight!

quests.title: Kill A Piglin Brute
desc:
Piglin Brutes being here might cause controversey but I consider them Minibosses. 

They spawn in Bastions with regular Piglins but these are Hostile not Neutral. Personally I hate that, especially since if you hit them all Piglins will turn Hostile on you. 

They have 50 Hearts and a Golden Axe to hit you. Usually Golden Axes barely do any damage, but when they use it, it is god somehow! 

They drop nothing and act more like an obstacle for Bastions!

quests.title: Kill A Rotbeast
desc: Rotbeasts are Minibosses that spawn all over the Undergarden.

quests.title: Eye see you!
desc:
Not all Cataclysm Dungeons are as easy to find as the &eCursed Pyramids&r are. 

So, a specific Eye might help you find them! 

Each of the different Eyes will lead you to its set structure; and don't worry, the Eyes rarely break.

quests.title: &4Eye of Mech&r
desc: The &4Eye of Mech&r will take you to the &4Ancient Factory&r to fight &4&lThe Harbinger&r.

quests.title: &bEye of Flame&r
desc: The &bEye of Flame&r will take you to the &bBurning Arena&r to fight the &b&lIgnis&r.

quests.title: &dEye of Void&r
desc: The &dEye of Void&r will take you to the &dRuined Citadel&r to fight the &d&lEnder Guardian&r.

quests.title: &cEye of Monstrous&r
desc: The &cEye of Monstrous&r will take you to the &cSoul BlackSmith&r to fight the &c&lNetherite Monstrousity&r.

quests.title: &5Eye of Abyss&r
desc: The &5Eye of Abyss&r will take you to the &5Sunken City&r to fight the &5&lLeviathan&r.

quests.title: &eEye of Desert&r
desc: The &eEye of Desert&r will take you to the &eCursed Pyramid&r to fight the &e&lAncient Remnant&r.

quests.title: &4Nether&r: Land of 2 bosses
desc: The Dimension known for housing the piglins and blazes and wither skeletons, now houses 2 more bosses to fight!

quests.title: &2Overworld&r: Land of &m3 4&r 5 bosses
desc: Do I really need to explain the &2Overworld&r to you?

quests.title: &5End&r: Land of 1 lonely boss
desc:
The Barren Wasteland of the &5End&r now has 1 more resident. 

The other being the &dEnder Dragon&r of course!

quests.title: &5&lThe Leviathan&r
desc:
&5&lThe Leviathan&r is the reason people fear the Ocean. 

She has 30,000 &4Hearts&r, sharp teeth, and strong tentacles and is invincible outside of &9Water&r. 

She has a huge array of powers she will use against you. She can summon underwater &5Mines&r, shoot a Godzilla like &5Atomic Beam&r, and even just chomp on you. 

The worst comes from the &5vortexs&r though! And I don't mean the &6&lATM Dev&r! 

She can use her tentacles to break open a &5Water Vortex&r which will suck in all Entities nearby as bait for her. She can also summon &5Lasers&r from &5vortexs&r on the Ocean floor which will shoot upward. 

Once you bring her beneath half &4Health&r she will become enraged! When enraged she will use her &5Lasers&r much more than before and attack relentlessly until the Oceans only have one being swimming in them.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_leviathan.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &4&lThe Harbinger&r
desc:
&4&lThe Harbinger&r takes a lot of inspiration from what powers him, the Nether Star. 

He has 15,600 &4Hearts&r and will attack every Mob and Player he sees that doesn't spawn in the &4Ancient Factory&r. 

He will fly around and even charge at you. Like &0The Wither&r, &l&4The Harbringer&r will break almost every Block in its path. 

To attack he can shoot &4Wither Missiles&r at you which can give you &0Wither Effect&r or shoot &4Wither Howitzers&r from his back which will shoot off in every direction. 

He also has &4Lasers&r he can shoot you with, &4Laser Gatlings&r, and a &4big mouth beam&r. 

He has a big weakness, like the other living machines, he is weak to the &4EMPs&r! If you use them on him, he will be stun locked, unable to move or fight for a few seconds.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_harbinger.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &e&lAncient Remnant&r
desc:
The &e&lAncient Remnant&r is master of his domain, of &eSand&r. 

He has 3,600 &4Hearts&r and is aided with a &eWadjet&r and a &eKobolediator&r. 

He has a few moves and attacks! He can swing his bony tail at you, bite you, or he might stomp on the ground, producing Shockwaves. 

He can also summon &eSandstorms&r with a mighty ROAR and even drop &eSand Traps&r on your head. 

Another attack he may use to get closer to you is his charge. His charge will hurt you and your FPS as it destroys every Block in his path. 

He does have a weakness, the very thing that ressurected him! If you hit his &eNecklace&r he will be knocked down for a little bit, giving you the perfect chance to strike him down and return him to the grave!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_remnant.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &c&lNetherite Monstrosity&r
desc:
The &c&lNetherite Monstrosity&r lives up to his name, he's a beast of &cNetherite &fand &cLava&r. 

He can have up to 48,000 &4Hearts&r but when I first met him he was only at around 9,500 &4Hearts&r. He will regenerate &4Hearts&r when no Player is nearby.

He has a few Melee attacks like smacking you with his massive arms and ground pounding on you. He can also throw blocks in the Air causing a Shockwave. 

If you get farther from him he might charge at you or leap at you. Honestly he looks like he weighs 100 Tons, I wouldn't want him doing either to me! 

The worst of his attacks are definitely the Ranged ones though... he can shoot &cMagma Balls&r at you and where they drop, &cLava&r will spawn. He can also shoot &cFireballs&r from his hands, these will cause &cFire Spouts&r to come out of the ground.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_monstrosity.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &b&lIgnis&r
desc:
Once you use the &bBurning Ashes&r on the &bAlter of Flame&r you'll get the &b&lIgnis&r. 
He has 11,250 &4Hearts&r and has a massive &bSword &fand &bShield&r. 

The &bShield&r will block damage you give and the &bSword&r can be used to slice and stab you. Once stabbed, you can't move, you can only attack. 

He can also pounce on you, when he does, he will slam his &bShield&r down, making a Shockwave which will toss Blocks and you into the Air. He can do the same with his &bSword&r just without the need to pounce. 

Another attack he has is &bFireballs&r. He will throw 3 &bFireballs&r into the Air, then they will be sent flying toward you! Hit them back at him as if they were a Ghast Fireball. 

Once you beat his &4Health&r to around 7,500 &4Hearts&r he will change colors to a &bLight Blue color&r. Now he will Attack quicker, deal more Damage, and get Lifesteal. 

His &bFireballs&r will also not be able to be reflected and he can now make different types of Shockwaves!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_ignis.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &d&lEnder Guardian&r
desc:
The &d&lEnder Guardian&r is a hulking beast of Endstone, &dPurpur&r, and &5Obsidian&r that waits within the &dVoid Altar&r. 
It has 13,320 &4Hearts&r and careful not to get too close or you might be sucked closer to him! 

He has a ton of attacks and abilities, one being a very simple punch for those who are too close to his personal space, or a slam which will knock you back. 

If you are farther from him, he might close the gap by charging and knocking into you. Or he might stomp and produce &dVoid Runes&r to hit you! He can also send &dShulker Balls&r in a row. 

Also remember when I said he can suck you closer to him? Yeah he does that with a thing called a &dVoid Typhon&r, which he can also summon at your Feet to get you stuck. After you are there for too long, it will explode, most likely damaging you in the process. 

When you get him to half &4Health&r, his Mask will break revealing his true Head! In anger he will destroy the floor of the arena taking you both to the lower level. 

Now he will suck you in more, send more &dVoid Runes&r after you, and attack faster and stronger!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_guardiuan.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &cSoul BlackSmith&f: Home of the &c&lNetherite Monstrosity&r
quests.title_plain: Soul BlackSmith: Home of the Netherite Monstrosity
desc:
&cThe Soul BlackSmith&r resides in the Nether&r. Don't overlook it thinking it is a Bastion, it's much worse. 

You can find Gold, Blackstone, and Netherite here. 

The only hostile Mobs that spawn here is the boss... the &c&lNetherite Monstrosity&r!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_blacksmith.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &bBurning Arena&r: Home of the &b&lIgnis&r
quests.title_plain: Burning Arena: Home of the Ignis
desc:
The &bBurning Arena&r is a giant Colosseum-esque Arena within the &4Nether&r. 
You'll arrive at the peaceful but hot 1st floor, on the 2nd floor you'll find &b|gnited Revenants&r which you'll need to kill for &bBurning Ashes&r. 

Which can then be used on the 3rd floor, in the Altar to summon the &b&lIgnis&r! 

Oh yeah and if you're looking for Loot, check above the 3rd floor!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_arena.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &dRuined Citadel&r: Home of the &d&lEnder Guardian&r
quests.title_plain: Ruined Citadel: Home of the Ender Guardian
desc:
Another structure to cover the barreness of &5The End&r, the &dRuined Citadel&r. 

The &dRuined Citadel&r is a Palace of &5Obsidian&r, Endstone, and &dPurpur&r. 

In the palace you'll find Chests, Shulker Boxes, Shulkers, and even the unique &dVoid Stone&r! 

Just be careful of the afformentioned Shulkers, &dEndermaptera&r, and &dEnder Golems&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_citadel.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &eCursed Pyramid&r: Home of &e&lAncient Remnant&r
quests.title_plain: Cursed Pyramid: Home of Ancient Remnant
desc:
&eThe Cursed Pyramid&r spawns in deserts and it's very hard to miss. A massive pyramid with huge pillars by the entrance. 

Enter within and you will find traps all around, &eKoboletons&r, and mini-bosses! 

Don't worry there's also Chests, Pots, and even Suspicious Sand which you will need for the...
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_pyramid.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &5Sunken City&r: Home of &5&lThe Leviathan&r
quests.title_plain: Sunken City: Home of The Leviathan
desc:
Who knows what happened to bring this &5City&r under the &9Water&r, but clearly it is! You'll easily notice it by the Stone Bricks sticking out of the &9Water&r. 

The first and biggest room is the City Center, the giant dome! This is where the &5Altar of the Abyss&r is. 

Off of the rooms you'll find hallways which lead to other buildings in the &5City&r. Prisons holding &5Coralussus&r and even Treasure Rooms holding tons of precious Loot! 

All around the &5City&r you will find its inhabitants, the &5Deeplings&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_city.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &4Ancient Factory&r: Home of &4&lThe Harbinger&r
quests.title_plain: Ancient Factory: Home of The Harbinger
desc:
&4The Ancient Factory&r lies deep underground in the &2Overworld&r. 

You'll find many Redstone Items like Levers, Powered Rails, and EMPs... I wonder if those will be useful soon? 

You'll also find some Redstone Machines trying to kill you! Like the &4Watchers &fand &4Prowlers&r! 

Even with the danger there's still tons of Loot and Blocks you can steal from here, especially Redstone.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_factory.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &eNecklace of the desert
quests.subtitle: Resurecting an Ancient Remnant
desc:
To find these we'll need a little archeology! 

In the giant shaft you'll take to get to the &e&lAncient Remnant&r, there are 3 rooms on the sides of it. 

2 of these rooms have Suspicious Sand which you can use a Brush on to get Loot! Including the &eNecklace of Desert&r. 
Then, Right Click the &e&lAncient Remnant&r with the &eNecklace of Desert&r to resurect it!

quests.title: &bBurning Ashes
quests.subtitle: Relighting the Ignis
desc:
Because just fighting the &b&lIgnis&r isn't hard enough, you'll have to fight the &bIgnited Revenant&r first to get &bBurning Ashes&r. 

Once you have them, use them on the Altar of Fire to summon the &b&lIgnis&r.

quests.title: &5Abyssal Sacrifice
quests.subtitle: Waking up The Leviathan
desc:
In order to fight &5&lThe Leviathan&r you'll need a sacrifice. The &5Abyssal Sacrifice&r to be specific. 

The most basic Items needed is the Blocks of Ingots and Amethyst which are just &2&lVanilla&r Items. 

Then, you'll need a Nautilus Shell and a Heart of the Sea. These are &2&lVanilla&r Items which are rare to get... unless you kill &5Deeplings&r which can drop them! 

You'll also need an Athame which is a weapon used by &5Deepling Warlocks &fand &5Priests&r and dropped by them on death. 
The last part gives us a choice, either Crystallized Coral or Coral Chunk. Both are drops from &5Coral Golem&r and &5Coralssus&r.

quests.title: Nether Star
quests.subtitle: Powering The Harbinger
desc:
To power up &4&lThe Harbinger&r you'll need a Nether Star, which you get from killing the Wither. 

It's a &2&lVanilla&r mechanic I shouldn't have to explain. 

Plus it's in Chapter 1.

quests.title: &cInfernal Forge
desc:
The &cInfernal Forge&r is a drop from the &c&lNetherite Monstrosity&r and is technically not a weapon, it's a pickaxe! 
It can be used to mine up to Netherite Tier, so it can mine Allthemodium Ore. 

When right clicked it will attack in an AOE mode. Pounding the ground hitting everything close by. 

(It can be enchanted with Sword and Pickaxe enchantments!)

quests.title: &5Tidal Claws
desc:
&5Tidal Claws&r are a confirmed drop from &5&lThe Leviathan&r. 

It has two modes, attack and grapple. Attack is with Left Click, Grapple is with Right Click. 

When you use its attack it will launch the claw and go through max of 5 mobs. Dealing damage and giving &5Abyssal Curse&r which will continue to damage them. 

The grapple instead will latch on to whatever is in range and pull you toward it. 

There's no durability so enjoy it forever!

quests.title: Wither plus Netherite = ...?
quests.subtitle: = Witherite
desc:
Witherite is a drop from &4The Harbinger&r, it will always drop 1 block which can be made into 9 ingots. 

Witherite is used to craft 3 Weapons and the &4Mechanical Fusion Anvil&r which can be used to combine &4&lCataclysm&r Items!

quests.title: &cMonstrous Helm
desc:
You can combine a Netherite Upgrade Template, a Netherite Helmet, and a &cMonstrous Horn&r to make the &cMonstrous Helm&r. 

It has the same stats but when you're at half health it'll Knockback everything close to you and increase defense stats.

quests.title: Abyssal Egg
desc:
The &5Abyssal Egg&r is also a drop from &5&lThe Leviathan&r, because apparently you killed a pregnant one. 

Place the &5Egg&r down, then wait awhile and you'll have your own baby &5Leviathan&r. 

Once its hatched you can feed it a ton of Tropical Fish to tame it. 

The &5baby&r has 2400 &4Hearts&r and can heal by feeding it Tropical Fish. 

Once tamed, like the &eModern Remnant&r it can be set with Shift Right Click to follow or stay or wander.

quests.title: &4Laser Gatling
quests.subtitle: Straight outta Fallout
desc:
The &4Laser Gatling&r is a weapon you can make from &4Witherite&r. 

By using Redstone in your inventory, you can shoot Lasers which start fires and do 3 and a half &4Hearts&r of damage. 

It shoots 50 Lasers per 1 redstone which I think is a good deal.

quests.title: &4Meat Shredder
quests.subtitle: Straight outta Fallout 3 DLC The Pitt
desc:
The &4Meat Shredder&r is a Melee weapon you can make from &4Witherite&r. 

It has two attacks, either using Left Click or Right Click. 

When you Left Click it'll use the &4Meat Shredder&r like an Axe, hitting them once from a decent range. 

When you hit Right Click it will repeatedly shred them with it's Saw, doing much quicker Damage from closer.

quests.title: &4W.A.S.W. (Wither Assault Shoulder Weapon)
desc:
The &4Wither Assault Shoulder Weapon (W.A.S.W.)&r is the last weapon you can make from &4Witherite&r. 

It has 2 different projectiles it can shoot: &4Wither Missiles&r and &4Wither Howitzers&r. 

The &4Wither Missiles&r shoot from just Holding Right Click, and will Damage whatever gets hit by them, with low cooldown. 

The &4Wither Howitzers&r are fired when you Shift Hold Right Click, they damage a bigger area and leave an area of Wither Effect, that damages whatever walks in it. They have much longer cooldown though.

quests.title: &4Mechanical Fusion Anvil
desc:
The &4Mechanical Fusion Anvil&r will be needed to make combinations of &4&lCataclysm&r Items. 

You can place it down like a normal Anvil, but this one doesn't have Durability... thankfully! 

Check JEI for Recipes, you place 1 Item in the Left Slot and the other in the Middle Slot to get the final product in the Right Slot.

quests.title: &dVoid &cForge
desc:
Combine an &cInfernal Forge&r with a &dVoid Core&r to make the &dVoid &cForge&r! 

It is still a Pickaxe, with same Mining Tier and Speed. 

Just now we can Right Click with it, on the ground to summon &dVoid Runes&r in a fan shape, to hurt all Mobs with it. 

They really don't focus much on the Pickaxe part do they?

quests.title: &dV.&4A.S.W. &d(Void &4Assault Shoulder Weapon)
desc:
The &dVoid &4Assault Shoulder Weapon &d(V.&4A.S.W.)&r is just like the Wither version but better! 

Now it only shoots &dVoid &4Howitzers&r which will do more Damage and cause &dVoid Runes&r to come out of the ground, in the area the &4Howitzer&r hit. 

Just at the cost of the long cooldown, but we've got time to wait. 

It can crafted by combining the &4W.A.S.W.&r and a &dVoid Core&r in the &4Mechanical Infusion Anvil&r.

quests.title: &dGauntlet of &bBulwark
desc:
The &dGauntlet of &bBulwark&r acts different from what you'd assume. 

Instead of bringing mobs closer it pushes them away, when Holding Right Click, and gives them &bBlazing Brand&r. 

Then when you release Right Click you'll charge in the direction you are looking. 

It's made by fusing the &dGauntlet of Guard&r with a &bBulwark of Flame&r in the &4Mechanical Fusion Anvil&r.

quests.title: &bIgnitium
quests.subtitle: Better than Netherite?
desc:
&bIgnitium&r is like Netherite but it takes actual skill to get. 

The &b&lIgnis&r will only drop 1 so get good use of it! 

You can use it to upgrade your Netherite Armor or use it to make the Weapons.

quests.title: &bBulwark of the Flame
desc:
You like the &b&lIgnis'&r shield? Well you can make 1 of your own with &bIgnitium&r. 

The &bBulwark of the Flame&r can be used like a normal Shield but also has a special effect. 

When Holding Right Click and Shift, letting go will let you charge at whatever is infront of you, like how goats do. 

Whatever gets hit will take Damage and if pinched against a wall will also get stunned. 

Definitely nice to have around!

quests.title: &bThe Incinerator
desc:
My personal favorite and one of the most powerful. 

The &bIncinerator&r can be used just like a normal Sword and Enchanted like one! 
But when Holding Right Click it does something no normal Sword does. When you Hold and let go of Right Click for a few seconds, massive flames will strike out of the ground in the direction you are looking at, then they will explode. 

It is also massive, which not just looks cool, but also gives better Range!

quests.title: &dGauntlet of Guard
desc:
The &dGauntlet of the Guard&r is the drop from the &d&lEnder Guardian&r. 

When you hold it in either Hand, you can Hold Right Click to bring all Mobs near you, even closer! 

You can also smack Mobs with it in your Main Hand to deal Damage. 

Try using the pull mechanic with flying to drop Mobs!

quests.title: &4The Prowler&r
desc:
Looks like someone flipped the ON switch this time! 

&4The Prowler&r is a miniboss guarding the &4Ancient Factory&r. He has 640 &4Hearts&r. 

He has 3 attacks. The Saw for close up Enemies. And for farther Enemies he has Shoulder Missiles, similar to the WASW, and a Laser from his eye. 

On death he'll drop Redstone and Iron. 
(Tip he's also weak to the EMP attacks)

quests.title: &5Coralssus&r
desc:
&5The Coralssus&r works as a Guard and Steed for the &5Sunken City&r. 

They can be ridden by &5Deeplings&r to move quicker and attack together! 

They have 160 &4Hearts&r and basic attacks . Its attacks are just smacking and throwing you. 

When killed it'll drop Coral Chunks which can be used to make the &5Abyssal Sacrifice&r.

quests.title: &2Amethyst Crab&r
desc:
The &2Amethyst Crab&r lives in the Lush Caves with the Axolotls. 

It has 2800 &4Hearts&r and is initially neutral. That means it won't attack first but it will hit you back. 

It has a few attacks one being just smacking you with its claws. It can also throw Amethysts at you and burrow under the ground. 

On death it'll drop its meat and shells. Its meat can be blessed in an Altar of Amethyst to be better. The Shells can be crafted together to make Bloom Stone Pauldrons which have similar stats to Netherite Chestplate but can do similar abilities as the &2Crab&r itself.

quests.title: &bIgnited Revenant&r
desc:
The &bIgnited Revenant&r stands in our way to kill the &b&lIgnis&r. 

The &bRevenant&r looks and acts like a Blaze, but instead of being Rods, he has Shields! 

These Shields make him invunerable to all attacks, you'll need to wait for him to lift them, to attack him! 

He has 1200 &4Hearts&r and has 2 attacks: one where he lifts in the air and throws Blaze Rods all around him, and the other where he spins his Shields around as if he was doing Spinjitzu. 

On death he will drop the &bBurning Ashes&r.

quests.title: &eBottle O' Sandstorm
desc:
Sorry, you can't wear these anymore, now they are just Items! 

By Right Clicking with them, 2 &eSandstorms&r will spawn. The &eSandstorms&r will circle you and move with you. 

Whatever is hit by them will be Damaged and Knockbacked.

quests.title: &dEnder Golem&r
desc:
The &dEnder Golem&r keeps guard of the &dRuined Citadel&r, well multiple of them do. 

Technically you don't need to fight them to fight the &dEnder Guardian&r but you definitely should to get the &dVoid Core&r. 

The &dEnder Golem&r has 5250 &4Hearts&r and will regenerate them when left alone. 

He has a few attacks like being able to punch you and smashing the ground. When he smashing the ground, &dVoid Runes&r will spawn, hurting any Player or Mob that touches them.

quests.title: &4&lCataclysm
desc:
&4&lCataclsym&r is a mod which adds new bosses, dungeons, and of course loot! 

There is no certain pattern of which bosses to kill first, but some are stronger than others, and some give loot that will help against the others. 

Check out the Eyes to find the specific Structures you'll need to locate!

quests.title: What shall not be named for my crashing reasons
quests.title_plain: What shall not be named for my crashing reasons
desc:
Want another pet from &4&lCataclysm&r? Then the Remnant Skull is what you need! 

It's a confirmed drop from the &eAncient Remnant&r and when used will spawn a Modern Revenant. 

This one is much smaller and nicer than the &eAncient&r one. You can tame it by feeding it a Sniffer Egg then it will act like a dog. 

Attacking what attacks you or what you attack. It also has 3 modes: follow, wander, and stay. Follow it will... well follow you. Wander will have it walking around a certain area. And stay will have it lay down in one spot. 

They have 2700 &4Hearts&r and I've learned you can feed them &eKoboleton Bones&r to heal them! 

Enjoy your new dino!

quests.title: &dEndermaptera
quests.subtitle: End Cockroaches
desc:
&dEndermaptera&r live around the &dRuined Citadel&r. 

They have 8 &4Hearts&r and only a basic attack of gnawing at you. 

If they gnaw at you too much they might break their jaws, to which they won't drop on death anymore. 

So make sure to kill them quickly if you want those &dVoid Jaws&r!

quests.title: &eKoboletons
quests.subtitle: Mini Dinos!
desc:
&eKoboletons&r are mini Dino Skeletons who serve the &e&lAncient Remnant&r. 

They only have 12 and a half &4Hearts&r and attack you with their Khopesh. 

They can drop their weapon, along with their Bones, and Ancient Metal Nuggets.

quests.title: &4The Watchers&r
desc:
&4The Watchers&r... well they watch the &4Ancient Factory&r. They'll attack anything they see (Player wise) with their 'fricken laser beams!' and Blades if they are close enough. 

They have 12 and a half &4Hearts&r, can fly, and are weak to EMP attacks as well. 

Like &4The Prowler&r they drop redstone and iron on death.

quests.title: &5Deeplings&r
desc:
The &5Deeplings&r are an ancient race of sea monsters who live and guard the &5Sunken City&r. They have their own rankings: Anglers, Brutes, Priests, and Warlocks. 

&5Deeplings&r are the most basic, only having 13 &4Hearts&r and a Coral Spear. 

&5Deepling Anglers&r are the next ones, they have 15 &4Hearts&r and hold a Fishing Rod with a &5Lionfish&r attached. The &5Lionfish&r will attack you and give you Poison, they have 6 &4Hearts&r. 

&5Deepling Brutes&r have 60 &4Hearts&r and hold a Coral Bardiche, which they will use to charge at you in the Water. 

&5Deepling Warlocks &fand &5Priests&r both have 45 &4Hearts&r and both hold Athame. The &5Priests&r have a ranged attack they can use, while &5Warlocks&r do not!

quests.title: &3Frosted Prison&r: Home of the &3&lMaledictus
quests.title_plain: Frosted Prison: Home of the Maledictus
desc:
The &3Frosted Prison&r is a massive Castle like structure on top and within the Snowy Mountains. 

Within you will find dozens of cells, armories, and a great room which the &3Cursed Tombstone&r lies. 

You can find plenty of Chests full of Loot, including Black Steel. There's Decorated Pots everywhere for the taking! 

And of course Mobs enemies to stand in your way: &3Draugrs&r and &3Aptrgangr&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_prison.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &3&lMaledictus
desc:
The &3&lMaledictus&r can be brought back from Valhalla or whatever the Norse version of Hell is, by Right Clicking the &3Cursed Tombstone&r. 

He has 50,400 &4Hearts&r and massive Wings. 

He will swing at you with his 2 &3Annihilators&r and can even ground pound you with them, making a Shockwave of course! 

His Wings allow him to manevure and do many more attacks. He can charge at you, breaking all Blocks in his way or even dodge attacks! 

He can fly into the air and from there can either shoot at you with his &3Cursed Bow&r or drop down with his &3Soul Render&r. The &3Cursed Bow&r will shoot 4 Arrows at you. With his &3Soul Render&r he will bring a shower of &3Phantom Halberds&r down on you.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_maledictus.png width:125 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &3Eye of Curse
desc: The &3Eye of Curse&r will lead you to the &3Frosted Prison&r to fight the &3&lMaledictus&r.

quests.title: &5Coral Golem
desc:
&5Coral Golems&r spawn within the &5Sunken City&r. 

They are similar to their bigger counterparts: &5Coralssus&r but have less &4Hearts&r at 110 and can't be ridden by &5Deeplings&r. 

They have more attacks than their counterparts though! Like jumping at you and smashing the ground next to you. And it can smack you. 

On death they will drop Crystallized Coral Fragments, which can be crafted into Crystallized Coral. Those can be made into the &5Abyssal Sacrifice&r.

quests.title: &eKobolediator
desc:
&eKobolediators&r are one of the two mini-bosses within the &eCursed Pyramid&r. 

They will remain dormant until a Player (in Survival, took me awhile to figure that out) walks near them and they will wake up. 

They have 1080 &4Hearts&r and will inflict Mining Fatigue on you. 

They will swing their Sword at you if you get too close! If you gain some distance from them, they will charge at you as if you were holding a Football and running for the endzone! 

On death they will drop Koboleton Bones, Ancient Metal Ingots, and their Skull!

quests.title: &eWadjet
desc:
The &eWadjet&r is similar to the &eKobolediator&r as it lies within the &eCursed Pyramid&r waiting for a Player to come near. 

The &eWadjet&r has 1050 &4Hearts&r and thankfully won't give you Mining Fatigue! 
She has many attacks, the most basic is when you are close she will swing her weapon at you. If you get farther she might throw a Sandstorm at you or drop Sand Blocks from the roof on top of you. 

I'm going to be honest, I don't know which attack is worse! 

On death they will only drop Ancient Metal Ingots.

quests.title: &bIgnited Berserker
desc:
This one is quite unique in its spawning! After you kill the &b&lIgnis&r, there's a chance &bIgnited Berserkers&r will spawn in Nether Fortresses. 

They are just like &bRevenants&r just instead of Shields they have Swords! Their Swords won't protect against damage like the Shields do, instead they deal more damage. 

They have much less health, at 65 &4Hearts&r and will drop Dying Embers when killed. 4 Dying Embers can be Crafted into 1 &bBurning Ashes&r.

quests.title: &3Aptrgangr
desc:
The &3Aptrgangr&r is the mini boss within the &3Frosted Prison&r. 

They have 800 &4Hearts&r and will attack you with their giant Axe. 

They can swing their Axe like normal, or they might smash it on the ground near you. When they do that, lasers will spawn damaging all in their path. They also have a charge attack similar to the &eKobolediator&r! 

On death they will drop Black Steel Ingots and Nuggets, and Rotten Flesh and Bones.

quests.title: &3Draugrs
desc:
&3Draugrs&r are similar to &5Deeplings&r as they have rankings. The &3Draugr&r rankings are: &3Draugr&r, &3Royal Draugr&r, and &3Elite Draugr&r. 

Normal &3Draugr&r have 14 &4Hearts&r and carry Black Steel Swords and Axes. These drop Rotten Flesh, Bones, and rarely Black Steel Nuggets. 

Next in line are &3Royal Draugr&r. These have 15 &4Hearts&r and carry Black Steel Targes along with the Swords and Axes. They drop the same Items as normal &3Draugrs&r. 

Last is the &3Elite Draugr&r. These switch between Black Steel Swords and Crossbows, depending on how far you are from them. They have 16 &4Hearts&r and drop, of course, the same loot!

quests.title: &bBlazing Grips
desc:
&bBlazing Grips&r are another Item we can make with &bIgnitium&r! 

It is a Curios Item that goes on your Hands. 

When worn, all attacks have a chance of giving the recipient &bBlazing Brand&r. 

I don't really know what it does, but it sucks to get from the &b&lIgnis&r.

quests.title: &bIgnitium Armor
desc:
&bIgnitium&r is an upgrade for Netherite. You'll need an &bIgnitium Upgrade&r which is Crafted, and an &bIgnitium Ingot&r which is dropped from the &b&lIgnis&r. 

The &bIgnitium Helmet&r allows you to see clearly under Lava. 

The &bIgnitium Chestplate&r can combined with an Elytra. 

The &bIgnitium Leggings&r don't make us flame-proof, rather the Fires that are covering our bodies will go out quicker! 
The &bIgnitium Boots&r allow us to walk over Lava. Like Leather Boots over Powdered Snow, you can Hold Shift to lower into the Lava.

quests.title: &cNetherite Ministrosity
desc:
The &cNetherite Ministrosity&r is a Pet given to us by &4&lCataclysm&r! 

First, you'll need to Craft a &cNetherite Effigy&r. 

Then, we can kill the &c&lNetherite Monstrosity&r for the &cLava Power Cells&r. 

Finally, place down the &cEffigy&r and feed it a &cPower Cell&r to tame him! 

Once tamed he can be Shift Right Clicked to edit whether he is following, staying, or wandering. 

You can also Right Click him to open his Inventory, aka cracking open his entire head like a Rock Monster from Lego Power Miners. He has an Inventory of 15 Slots. 

He also has 3000 &4Hearts&r and I can't find a way to heal him...

quests.title: &eAncient Metal
desc:
&eAncient Metal&r is a Drop from pretty much everything within the &eCursed Pyramid&r! 

Like other Ingots it can be Crafted from Nuggets or Blocks and vice versa. 

You can use it to make &eBone Reptile Armor&r or the &eAncient Spear&r.

quests.title: &3The Annihilator
desc:
&3The Annihilator&r is a very fun weapon made from &3Cursium&r and Black Steel. 

You can smack enemies around with it all day! But you know what's more fun than one &3Annihilator&r? 

Two &3Annihilators&r! 

If you have an &3Annihilator&r in each Hand, then you can Hold Right Click to do a powerful ground pound, damaging all around you!

quests.title: &3Soul Render
desc:
The &3Soul Render&r is crafted from &3Cursium&r and Black Steel. 

It being a massive weapon (as most in &4&lCataclysm&r are) it has big Range and a ton of Damage... but its special effects are even better! 

You can use Right Click to be sent charging forward with the &3Soul Render&r. When you do, &3Phantom Halberds&r will drop from the sky where you went! You can also Shift Right Click to spawn &3Phantom Halberds&r all around you.

quests.title: &3Cursed Bow
desc:
The &3Cursed Bow&r works similar to a Bow with the Multishot Enchantment! 

With normal Arrows, it will shoot 3 at a time! With special Arrows it will only shoot 2. 

I wonder if you can Enchant it with Multishot as well?

quests.title: &3Cursed Armor
desc:
&3Cursium Armor&r is an upgrade to Netherite Armor. Combine Netherite Gear, with a &3Cursium Ingot&r, and a &3Cursium Upgrade Template&r. You can Craft those don't worry! 

The &3Cursium Helmet&r can be used with the Key: C to see Mobs through Blocks! Like the Spectral Eye. 

The &3Cursium Chestplate&r works as a built in Totem of Undying. After you die you will be saved. It has a 6 minute Cooldown though... 

The &3Cursium Leggings&r are working with propability... not sure how that works in &2&lMinecraft&r though! 

The &3Cursium Boots&r allow you to get sent backwards in a leap with the Key: V. They also reduce Fall Damage but a lot (but not completely!)

quests.title: &dGauntlet of &eMaelstorm
desc:
The &dGauntlet of &eMaelstorm&r is made with the &dGauntlet of Guard&r and &eSandstorm in a Bottle&r in a &4Mechanical Fusion Anvil&r. 

This one is unique from all Weapons I've seen from &4&lCataclysm&r. 

When you Hold Right Click, a &dVoid &eVortex&r will spawn where you are aiming. 

The &dVoid &eVortex&r will suck in all Entities nearby, then after a few seconds, it will close and explode! Dealing Damage to all near it.

quests.title: &3The &bImmolator
desc:
&3The &bImmolator&r is an &3Annihilator&r upgraded with an &bIgnitium Ingot&r within the &4Mechanical Fusion Anvil&r. 

These do more Damage to Mobs with &bBlazing Brand&r afflicted on them, so &bBlazing Grips&r work pretty well with it! 

If you have &3The &bImmolator&r in each Hand, you can Hold right Click to summon a &bFlame Strike&r beneath you. This will Damage all Mobs in it and explode when done as a final farewell!

quests.title: &3Wrath of the &eDesert
desc:
The &3Wrath of the &eDesert&r is a combination of the &3Cursed Bow&r and &eSandstorm in a Bottle&r. 

This Bow doesn't shoot Arrows like normal, instead it will shoot &3Cursed &eSandstorms&r! 

Three of them to be exact! 

It also doesn't need Arrows to shoot, which is also nice.

quests.title: &bIgnitium Elytra Chestplate
desc: Just combine an &bIgnitium Chestplate&r with an Elytra... that simple!

quests.title: &dVoid Core
desc:
&dVoid Cores&r are drops from the &dEnder Golem&r! 

They are weapons, when you Right Click with them, &dVoid Runes&r will spawn from the ground. 

&dVoid Runes&r act like Evoker Fangs, they go in a line for about 10 Blocks in the direction you are using it toward. 

They do about 3 and a half &4Hearts&r of damage for each time they hit a Mob. They also knockback Mobs which Evoker Fangs do not. 

This can be used in Crafts for even more &4&lCataclysm&r Weapons!

quests.title: &dVoid Scatter Arrows
desc:
&dVoid Scatter Arrows&r are Crafted with a Spectral Arrow and a &dVoid Jaw&r. 

They can be shot by any Bow or Crossbow. When they hit any Mob or Block they will break apart. 

When they break apart, many parts will be thrown around the area, damaging whatever they hit!

quests.title: &eKhopesh
desc:
The &eKhopesh&r is the Weapon and Drop of &eKoboletons&r. 

It does the same damage as an Iron Sword but can't be Enchanted or Repaired. 

Guess they didn't plan on you using them that much...

quests.title: &eBone Reptile Armor
desc:
&eBone Reptile Armor&r is made from &eKoboleton Bones&r, &eAncient Metal&r, and for the Helmet a &eKobolediator Skull&r. 

These don't appear to do anything special, just give very good stats for cheap Armor!

quests.title: &eAncient Spear
desc:
Wait you're telling me for just a few &eAncient Metal&r we can get a Weapon that does more Damage than a Netherite Sword, has insane Range, and throws &eSandstorms&r!? 

Yep, that's what you get from the &eAncient Spear&r!

quests.title: Here hold this!
desc:
There's 3 Pets from &4&lCataclysm&r the &eModern Remnant&r, &5Baby Leviathan&r, and &4Netherite Ministrosity&r! 

Both the &eModern Remnant&r and &4Netherite Ministrosity&r can be placed in Buckets. 

The &5Baby Leviathan&r will need a Water Bucket.

quests.title: Quest 00307A89
desc:
This Quest has been authored by &6AllTheMods Staff&r, or a &2Community contributor&r for use in AllTheMods Modpacks.

As all &6AllTheMods&r packs are licensed under &eAll Rights Reserved&r, this Quest is not allowed to be used in any public packs not released by &6AllTheMods Team&r without explicit permission.

This quest is intentionally hidden, if you're seeing this, you're in editing mode.

quests.title: &9Acropolis&f: Home of &9&lScylla
desc:
The &9Acropolis&r is a giant city in the Clouds above the vast &9Oceans&r. (Yet I somehow didn't see it the first time). 

It is made of &9Azure Seastone&r, &3Prismarine&r, and &9Water&r! Yes, lots and lots and lots of &9Water&r! 

It is based off Greek Architecture, with lots of different floors and gardens and even arenas. 

All around it will spawn &9Octohosts&r, &9Urchinkin&r, &9Cindaria&r, &9Hippotamus&r, and &9Clawdian&r! As well as a few very unfortunate &9Ocean&r Mobs. 

Hidden throughout the Architecture you'll find Chests and rare Blocks like Diamond Blocks and Sponges!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_acropolis.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &9Chitin Claw
desc:
Here's your Crab Claw from the Mob Vote! 

Just the Crab you need to kill is much bigger... and meaner... 

The Chitin Claw is a Drop from the Clawdian. 

When worn you will get increased Block Reach and Entity Reach. So you can place Blocks farther and smack Mobs farther as well!

quests.title: &9Astrape
desc:
With 2 &9Essence of the Storm&r and 3 &9Lacrima&r we can make &9Astrape&r. 

&9Astrape&r is a combination of the Weapons used by the &9Hippocamtus&r and &9Cindaria&r. 

It can stab like a Trident, just with more Damage and Range. Plus you can Hold Right Click to send &9Lightning Spears&r, just like &9Cindaria&r! 

The &9Lightning Spears&r still bounce off Walls! Just now with a Cooldown...

quests.title: &9Ceraunus
desc:
&9Ceraunus&r is the Anchor Weapon &9&lScylla&r herself uses! 

With just 2 &9Essence of the Storm&r and 3 &9Lacrima&r we can Craft it! Just in a different order than you would for &9Astrape&r. 

You can swing the Anchor around like a Mace, with a very long delay. Or use it for special attacks! 

Hold Right Click to toss the Anchor in front of you. When it hits a Mob, it will Damage them and hit them back. 

You can also Hold Shift Right Click to instead of throwing the Anchor, you throw &9Waves&r in an array in front of you!

quests.title: &3Strange Key
quests.subtitle: Unlocking access to the Maledictus
desc:
I guess the &3Draugrs&r really wanted to keep the &3Cursed Tombstone&r safe because they Locked it! 

The &3Door of Seal&r, yeah a really creative name, blocks us from getting to it. We'll need a &3Strange Key&r to open it. 

Again, they really want it locked up because they gave the &3Strange Key&r to the &3Aptrgangr&r. Only the toughest guys in the &3Frosted Prison&r who are still alive!

quests.title: &9Eye of Storm
desc: The &9Eye of Storm&r will take you to the &9Acropolis&r to fight &9&lScylla&r.

quests.title: &9&lScylla
desc:
The tippy top of the massive &9Acropolis&r is where the &9&lScylla&r will spawn. Like the &d&lEnder Guardian&r you just need to be near to Spawn here. 

She is one of the smallest Bosses in &4&lCataclsym&r only being around 3 Blocks Tall. As well as right now, she has 390 &4Hearts&r and 12 Armor Points. Don't worry, she'll be Buffed very soon! 

Don't let her Size or lack of &6&lATM10&r Buffs let you underestimate her, she has some of the most Attacks of all Bosses here. 

She can use her &9Anchor&r, &9Ceranus&r, to pull you closer to her from far away, or simply swing it at you to deal a ton of Damage! 

She can toss &9Lightning Spears&r at you from her Back or from Clouds. Even leaping into the Air and Jumping back down to bring &9Lightning Strikes&r all around where she Hit. 

That's not even it! She also has control over &9Water&r allowing her to send &9Waves&r at you or even summon &9Water Snakes&r to Bite you! 

When slayed, she will Drop the usual Boss Gear, as well as &9Lacrima&r and &9Essence of the Storm&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/cataclysm/cataclysm_scylla.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &9Urchinkin
desc:
&9Urchinkin&r are small pests who for some reason live in &9Acropolis&r. 

They have 6 &4Hearts&r with no Armor. Thankfully pretty weak. 

They have a few Attacks, if they are near you they will Hit you. If there is some distance they will roll at you. When they roll, tons of their &9Spikes&r will be shot out, doing Damage to anyone they hit! 

On death they won't Drop anything unique. Besides more &9Spikes&r to Damage you, that's all.

quests.title: &9Octohost
desc:
The &9Octohost&r is actually 2 Mobs working together! To Kill you! 

It has the &9Symbiocto&r which controls the &9Drowned Host&r. 

&9Symbiocto&r has 8 &4Hearts&r and no Armor. When on its own, it will just Shoot &0Ink&r at you. On Death they will Drop &0Ink Sacs&r. 

The &9Drowned Host&r acts like a normal &9Drowned&r. They have 10 &4Hearts&r as well as 2 Armor Points. &9Drowned Host&r can Spawn with Armor and Weapons which they can use. 

When together, they will use their Attacks on you at the same time. The &9Symbiocto&r will Shoot you with &0Ink&r while the &9Drowned Host&r will use Weapons or Fists to Hit you.

quests.title: &9Cindaria
desc:
&9Cindaria&r are Jellyfish/Human Mobs that protect &9Acropolis&r. They are Greenish/Purple-ish and transparent. 

They have 60 &4Hearts&r with no Armor. 

They also wield what looks like an Umbrella but is actually a deadly Weaon! 

If you are too close, they'll swing their Weapon to Hit you with it. If you are farther, they will Shoot a &9Lightning Spear&r at you. 

&9Lightning Spears&r bounce off Walls, thankfully the &9Acropolis&r doesn't have many of those! 

On Death, the &9Cindaria&r will Drop &9Lacrima&r.

quests.title: &9Clawdian
desc:
The &9Clawdian&r is the miniboss of &9Acropolis&r. 

They are huge lobsters who hold an even bigger Axe! 

They have 225 &4Hearts&r and 12 Armor Points. 

They like to use their Axe and Feet to Attack you. From swinging their Axe at you to do moderate Damage. To smashing the ground with an Axe to unleash a Shockwave. To stomping on the ground to unleash an even bigger Shockwave and &9Waves&r at you! 

If you get too far they'll charge after you, Breaking Blocks in their way! 

If you can Kill one, they'll Drop their &9Claw&r! Kinda graphic but thankfully it's just fantasy violence!

quests.title: &9Hippocamtus
desc:
&9Hippocamtus&r are powerful Sea Horse warriors who guard &9Acropolis&r. 

They wear lots of Armor and hold a Spear and Shield. 

They have 85 &4Hearts&r and 18 Armor Points. 

Their Shield will protect from Damage and their Spear will be used to Kill you. They can swing, stab, and even do a special move on you. This move will lock you into place where the &9Hippocamtus&r will repeatedly stab you. 

Like the &9Cindaria&r, these will Drop &9Lacrima&r.

quests.title: &6&lAllthemodium
desc:
Obviously now that you are in Chapter 2, you have beaten &2&lVanilla Minecraft&r! 

By now you should have &cNetherite&r and have killed all the bosses &2&lMinecraft&r has. So what's next? 

&6&lAllthemodium&r is what's next! In order to start getting &6Allthemodium&r though you will need &cNetherite&r. Let's start there!

quests.title: Teleport Pad
desc:
For 4 &6Allthemodium Nuggets&r and an Ender Pearl you get a Teleport Pad. 

Place it down in one of the Minecraft dimensions to teleport to a different dimension. 

To teleport you need to shift right click with your main and offhand empty! That is important, read it! 

BOTH hands need to be EMPTY!

quests.title: &l&7Mining Dimension
desc:
The &l&7Mining Dimension&r is a Superflat world with absolutely nothing on the surface. 

Below the surface is almost every single Ore. 

The &7&lMining Dimension&r has no Caves, no Mob Spawns, and nothing to get in your way. It's just Stone types and Ores! 

Ore spawns differ for the Y Level and layer in the &7&lMining Dimension&r.

I recommend setting up a Quarry.

quests.title: &l&bThe Other&r
desc:
&b&lThe Other&r has seen dozens of changes over the years but always it has been a realm for adventures! 

There's dozens of new biomes, blocks, and of course structures! 

The Structures are: Piglin Village, Ancient Pyramid, and Dungeon. All containing amazing loot with some things being unique to their structure! 

You can also mine for &3Vibranium&r (and other ores!) or find it and better in the structures! 

You can't set up Quarries or many blocks in &b&lThe Other&r though, no cheesing anything here.

quests.title: &5&lThe Beyond
desc:
Welcome to &5&lThe Beyond&r! 

There's nothing here! 

You might want an Angel Block.

quests.title: Ancient City
desc:
Only the hardest Structure in &2&lVanilla Minecraft&r. So of course that's where you'll have to look for &6Allthemodium&r!

You can find the Ore in the walls of Caves around the Ancient Cities, it's Glowing so it'll be easy to spot just very rare!

 You will also be able to locate it in any &5Deep Dark Biome&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_city.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Ingot
desc:
To mine &6Allthemodium&r you'll need a Pickaxe that is &cNetherite&r Tier or higher! 

Once you finally get the Ore (first I recommend processing it either with Fortune, Occultism, or Mekanism to get more) then you can get a few choices of what to do with it. 

I recommend making 2 Teleport Pads with the &6Nuggets&r! You can use those to get to the &7&lMining Dimension&r to find more &6Allthemodium&r or &b&lThe Other&r to find other adventures. 

After that I recommend upgrading your Pickaxe so you can Mine &3Vibranium&r. The rest is all up to you!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_1.png width:100 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Smithing Template
desc:
Another Item you can only find in Ancient Cities is the &6Allthemodium Smithing Template&r.

To get it you'll need to Brush suspicious Clay.

You can find it in the floors of the Ancient City.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_clay.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &3Vibranium Smithing Template&r
desc:
To upgrade &6Allthemodium&r to &3Vibranium&r you will need another Smithing Template. 
This one you can find by Brushing Suspicious Soul Sand. 

Which is found in Bastions in &l&cThe Nether&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_bastion.png width:200 height:100 align:center}
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_soul.png width:200 height:100 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Armor
desc:
Direct upgrade from &cNetherite Armor&r, because of this it will keep the &5Enchants&r. 

The full &6AllTheModium&r set has 24 Armor Points, 20 Armor Toughness, and 50% Knockback Resistance. 

What you think that's all they give? 

&6Helmets&r: &9Water Breathings&r, Immunity to &3&lWarden&r &0Darkness Effect&r, and no &7Elytra&r Damage. 
&6Chestplate&r: 50% &dMagic Damage Resistance&r and &cFire Resistance&r. 
&6Leggings&r: &9Depth Strider&r and Immunity to &0Wither&r. 
&6Boots&r: Resist Fall Damage, let you walk on &bPowdered Snow&r and &cLava&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_armor_all.png width:100 height:175 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Arcanist Armor
desc: Similar stats as normal &6Allthemodium Armor&r but this comes with it's own set Mana Boosts, Regen, and Spell Power for Ars Spells!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_armor_allarcane.png width:100 height:175 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Mage Armor
desc:
The Stats are close to normal &6Allthemodium Armor&r but this gives more Power to Iron Spell's Spells. 

Plus it's own Max Mana and Mana Regen!
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_armor_allmage.png width:100 height:175 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Tools
desc:
Can't craft these anymore now you need to upgrade &cNetherite&r to it always. 
Yes, it saves Enchantments and Repairs it!

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Mace
desc:
&2&lVanilla&r couldn't have all the fun with Maces! So of course there is an &6Allthemodium&r upgrade to them! 

Upgrade a Mace with an &6Allthemodium Block&r to get the &6Allthemodium Mace&r. 

It does more base damage, more falling damage, and same Enchantments!

quests.title: &5Unobtainium Armor
desc:
&5Unobtainium Armor&r is the best we can get from &6&lAllTheModium&r! We'll need it for the real best Armors! 

&5Unobtainium Armor&r gives 40 Armor Points, 60 Armor Toughness, plus 100% Knockback Resistance. You ain't going anywhere! 

Now, along with the other effects given by the previous Armors, we'll get 90% &dMagic Damage Resistance&r.
{image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_armor_uno.png width:100 height:175 align:center}

quests.title: &5Unobtainium Arcanist Armor
desc: {image:atm:textures/questpics/allthemodium/all_armor_unoarcane.png width:100 height:175 align:center}

quests.title: &6Allthemodium Spell Book
desc: 13 Spellslots!

quests.title: &5Unobtainium Mage Armor
